ClaimPaymentSummary.name: ClaimPaymentSummary
ClaimPaymentSummary.description: Represents the amount of money that's paid to a claimant or claim participant to cover a claim.

CancellationDate.description: The date on which claim payment was canceled.

ClaimId.description: The ID of the claim associated with this claim payment.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the claim payment summary.

PaymentDate.description: Specifies the date when the claim payment was initiated.

PaymentIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payment record assigned by the financial transaction system.

PaymentStatus.description: Specifies the status of the claim payment.
